mapper.sql: select top 100 percent sewageID,areaID,controlID,AdministratorID,short_title,name,address,coordinateX,coordinateY,equipment1state,equipment2state,equipment3state,equipment4state,equipment5state,detection1,detection1UL,detection1DL,detection2,detection2UL,detection2DL,detection3UL,detection3,detection3DL,detection4,detection4UL,detection4DL,detection5,detection5UL,detection5DL,detection6,detection6UL,detection6DL,air_sched,water_sched,mud_sched,flow_sched,backup_sched,control_strategy,device_alert,gratingDays,confirmGratingTime,action,waterflow,reduceCOD,reduceNH3N,reduceP,operationnum,controlMethod,detection7,detection8,detection9,updatetime,detection10DL,detection11DL,detection12DL,detection13DL,detection14DL,detection15DL,detection16DL,detection17DL,detection18DL,detection19DL,detection20DL,detection10UL,detection11UL,detection12UL,detection13UL,detection14UL,detection15UL,detection16UL,detection17UL,detection18UL,detection19UL,detection20UL,detection7UL,detection7DL,detection8UL,detection8DL,detection9UL,detection9DL,runtimeperiod1,stoptimeperiod1,runtimeperiod2,stoptimeperiod2,runtimeperiod3,stoptimeperiod3,runtimeperiod4,stoptimeperiod4,runtimeperiod5,stoptimeperiod5,runtimeperiod6,stoptimeperiod6,runtimeperiod7,stoptimeperiod7,runtimeperiod8,stoptimeperiod8,runtimeperiod9,stoptimeperiod9,runtimeperiod10,stoptimeperiod10 from sewage where 1=1
mapper.select: select c.sewageID, sewage.short_title, sewage.name, sewage.coordinateX, sewage.coordinateY,sewage.controlMethod, sewage.detection1ul ,sewage.detection1dl ,sewage.detection2ul ,sewage.detection2dl,sewage.detection3ul ,sewage.detection3dl , sewage.detection4ul ,sewage.detection4dl,sewage.detection5ul ,sewage.detection5dl ,sewage.detection6ul ,sewage.detection6dl, c.* from (select detection_data.* from detection_data, (select MAX(testingtime) as testingtime,sewageid from detection_data group by sewageID) as a where detection_data.testingtime = a.testingtime and detection_data.sewageID = a.sewageID ) as c left join sewage on sewage.sewageID = c.sewageid where c.sewageID = 248

select c.sewageID, sewage.short_title, sewage.name, sewage.coordinateX, sewage.coordinateY,c.* from (select detection_data.* from detection_data, (select MAX(testingtime) as testingtime,sewageid from detection_data group by sewageID) as a where detection_data.testingtime = a.testingtime and detection_data.sewageID = a.sewageID ) as c left join sewage on sewage.sewageID = c.sewageid
select count(sewageid) from sewage where sewage.areaID = #{areaid}

SELECT TOP ${pageSize} * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY sewageid) AS RowNumber,* FROM ( select area.name as areaName, admin.name as admin,sewage.sewageID,sewage.name, sewage.short_title,sewage.coordinateX,sewage.coordinateY from sewage left join area on sewage.areaID = area.id left join admin_area on admin_area.areaid = area.id left join admin on admin_area.adminid = admin.id ) as b ) as A WHERE RowNumber > ${pageSize} * (${pageNum} - 1)

select
from sewage where operationnum = #{condition} or short_title= #{condition}

select sewageid from ( select sewageid,max(testingtime) as testingtime from detection_data group by sewageid ) as temp where CONVERT(varchar(12),testingtime,111) != CONVERT(varchar(12),getdate() ,111) union select sewage.sewageid from (select distinct sewageid from detection_data) tmp1 right join sewage on sewage.sewageid = tmp1.sewageid where tmp1.sewageid is null

(select sewageid from (select temp1.sewageID,temp1.testingtime,sewage.areaID from sewage , (select sewageid,max(testingtime) as testingtime from run_data group by sewageid ) as temp1 where sewage.sewageID = temp1.sewageId and CONVERT(varchar(12),testingtime,111) != CONVERT(varchar(12),getdate() ,111) and areaid = #{id}) as tmp) union (select sewage.sewageid from (select distinct detection_data.sewageid from detection_data) tmp1 right join sewage on sewage.sewageid = tmp1.sewageid where tmp1.sewageid is null and sewage.areaid = #{id})
select COUNT(*) from statistic where CONVERT(varchar(12),getdate()-1,111) = CONVERT(varchar(12),testingtime,111) and sewageid = #{id}
